record.title: RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - March 31, 2008)

[Page: S2251]

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I now ask unanimous consent that it stand in recess under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 5:39 p.m., recessed until Tuesday, April 1, 2008, at 10 a.m.
